transArray.content: We arrived at the hotel around 8 a.m. Not only did it provide early check-in, but the service attitude was also super good. There were also some snacks available at the front desk. It was really nice and awesome.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best!
